text: Hi James, i think you can do this with a RichText Module and Smart Content
Hi Andreas, thanks for replying, my problem is, we want this to be on a form header. So if we have a form that is on 200 pages, we've got to put the smart content on all 200 pages?
Or could we put the rich text module on the template, would that work?
it might work better on the template, have you tried it?
I'll try that now and see if I can create a transferable dynamic rich text module that I can place onto any templates containing the form
Thanks Andreas. I've managed to sort this now. Making a smart real text module and creating that module with the form it sits above. So we can add that to each template
Hello everyone. I’m trying to integrate HubSpot with our webinar platform, but seems like I’m stuck after reading all that documentation. Is there anyone who can help?

Hey everyone. Has anyone had any luck using Azure AD B2C as an SSO IdP? I've been able to get AAD working but not B2C, and I'm pretty stuck. Have also spent a lot of time searching both here & online but haven't found anything particularly useful yet.
